skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing markdown guidance for frontend design. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem operations, or external command invocations are present. The SKILL.md file contains only design instructions and best practices.

content.value_statement: I need creative, production-ready frontend interfaces that stand out from generic AI-generated designs. This skill delivers distinctive, carefully crafted web components with bold aesthetics and polished details.
actual_capabilities: Creates production-grade web components, pages, and applications
Generates distinctive designs that avoid generic AI aesthetics
Selects unique typography and cohesive color schemes
Builds spatial compositions with unexpected layouts
limitations: Does not execute code or run in browser environments
Does not create design files (Figma, Sketch, etc.)
Does not perform accessibility audits or testing

use_cases.title: Build Polished Components
use_cases.description: Create distinctive React, Vue, or vanilla JS components with creative aesthetics and smooth animations.

use_cases.title: Rapid Interface Prototyping
use_cases.description: Translate design concepts into working frontend code with bold visual direction and attention to detail.

use_cases.title: Complete Page Implementations
use_cases.description: Develop full web pages with cohesive design systems, responsive layouts, and engaging visual effects.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a [component name] with [functional description]. Use a [specific aesthetic direction] style.

prompt_templates.title: Animated Element
prompt_templates.prompt: Build an animated [element type] that features [specific animation effects]. Choose a [mood/theme] aesthetic.

prompt_templates.title: Themed Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a [section name] section with [brand/tone] aesthetics. Include [key elements] and [animation effects].

prompt_templates.title: Full Page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a complete [page type] page with [specific theme] design. Implement all sections with consistent aesthetics, animations, and responsive behavior.

output_examples.input: Create a navigation bar with a brutalist design aesthetic
output: Bold uppercase typography with heavy letter spacing
Sharp black and white color scheme with accent borders
Hover states with inverted colors and scale effects
CSS-only hamburger menu with smooth reveal animation
Sticky positioning with blur backdrop effect

best_practices: Commit to a bold aesthetic direction before coding and execute it consistently
Use CSS variables for consistent theming and easy customization
Prioritize CSS-only animations for performance, then enhance with JavaScript libraries
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto without intentional styling
Applying purple gradients on white backgrounds as default styling
Building predictable layouts without spatial interest or visual surprise

faq.question: Which frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with HTML/CSS/JS, React, Vue, and other modern frontend frameworks as requested.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with any Claude product?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for frontend design tasks.

faq.question: Does this skill create animation effects?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill implements CSS animations, micro-interactions, and can use animation libraries like Motion for React.

faq.question: How do I get unique designs each time?
faq.answer: Provide specific aesthetic directions. The skill intentionally avoids common choices to generate distinctive designs.

faq.question: Is the generated code production-ready?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill produces functional, production-grade code that follows best practices and modern standards.

faq.question: Can I request dark themes or specific color palettes?
faq.answer: Yes, specify your theme preferences. The skill supports light, dark, and custom themed designs with CSS variables.
